short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that creates a YouTube playlist from the copyright claims in YouTube Studio

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension creates a playlist / tracklist from a the copyright claims of a video in YouTube Studio. It support OpenAI and Azure OpenAI. After it created a playlist / tracklist, you can add it to the description of the video detail page.
